description: This file defines the GroqTools class, a Python class that provides methods for interacting with the Groq API, including transcribing audio, translating audio, and generating speech. It imports external modules and the Groq SDK, and manages API interactions and audio processing.

classes.name: GroqTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with the Groq API, providing methods for transcription, translation, and speech synthesis.

methods.name: transcribe_audio
methods.description: Transcribes audio from a local file or URL using Groq's Whisper API.

methods.name: translate_audio
methods.description: Translates audio from a local file or URL to English using Groq's API.

methods.name: generate_speech
methods.description: Generates speech from text input using Groq's Text-to-Speech API and adds the resulting audio as an artifact to the agent.
